title: Bottas says Cadillac has 'mountain of work' before F1 debut
summary: Valtteri Bottas has emphasised the daunting task facing the Cadillac F1 team in its attempts to make the 2026 season

qa_pairs.question: Which year is Cadillac expected to make its Formula 1 debut?
Who is the driver that highlighted the challenges faced by the Cadillac F1 team?
What is a significant challenge that new teams often face before entering Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Development of the car and infrastructure
